# [Interview #618: West Jordan Signing Report - 17th Shard, Entry #50](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=618#50)

#### Josh

Is Soulcasting a subset of Surgebinding?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes, it is.
